newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Queensland backs away from IR powers transfer.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Queensland backs away from IR powers transfer.

text.p: Queensland deputy premier and State treasurer Joan Sheldon said on Tuesday that Queensland would not be following Victoria in transferring its industrial relations powers to the federal government.
"Queensland will not be handing its IR laws to the Federal Government," Sheldon told a Property Council of Australia meeting.
"We are not handing power to the feds," Sheldon said after delivering a speech to the meeting.
She said the Queensland state government expected to have its own industrial relations legislation in force by the end of the year.
Victoria premier Jeff Kennett announced on Monday that Victoria was handing over its industrial relations powers to the federal government.
